description:
At last, Seth faces Hameline. She asserts that the people of this town aren`t worth saving as she unleashes fierce attacks on him. Seth has always used his magic to protect people, but after reflecting on his own past, he sympathizes with Hameline as he realizes that her circumstances and his are not so different. Sorcerers do indeed face persecution and segregation... but Seth promised Alma that he would never become a monster and use his powers violently. Just as Seth proposes an idea to Hameline, an Inquisition battleship suddenly attacks!
Source: crunchyroll
